text: Guangzhou Hotel Guangzhou Hotel () is a hotel in Guangzhou, China. It was constructed in 1968 amid the Cultural Revolution. With 27 floors, it surpassed Park Hotel in Shanghai as the tallest building in China. ==See also== *List of tallest buildings in Guangzhou *Baiyun Hotel ==References== Category:Hotels in Guangzhou Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1968 Category:1968 establishments in China Category:Hotels established in 1968 Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1968
title: Guangzhou Hotel
